SignalR.ConnectionString: Set your SignalR connstring: set secret with dotnet user-secrets set Azure:SignalR:ConnectionString <connection string>

CheckpointStorageAccount.ConnectionString: Set your Storage Account connection string: dotnet user-secrets set Azure:CheckpointStorageAccount:ConnectionString <connection string>

IotHub.ConnectionString: Set your IoT Hub connection string: dotnet user-secrets set Azure:IotHub:ConnectionString <connection string>

Redis.ConnectionString: Set your Azure Cache for Redis connection string: dotnet user-secrets set Azure:Redis:ConnectionString <connection string>
